website_summaries.verdict: The Sole Fury SE comes from the distinctive family of split-soled sneakers, whose lineage dates back to the 1990s. As such, the sneaker inherits not only the classic chunky silhouette—which turned many heads—but also the exceptional comfort, support, and stability it delivers to the foot. All of which are cornerstone qualities of Reebok.However, a few have deemed the laces too long and felt the sizes ran slightly smaller. Even so, the Reebok Sole Fury SE still stands as a potential favorite sneaker, up for grabs at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Reebok Sole Fury SE reviewers are almost unanimous in regarding the sneaker as extremely comfortable to wear
Many testers find the sneaker to be very lightweight, with a few adding that the sneaker felt like a sock
Its mesh upper is well-ventilated, a few users have noted
Majority of shoppers are delighted by the sneaker’s bold, eye-catching silhouette, with one describing it strikingly as “in-your-face amazing!”
Its sleek style easily matches any sporty or casual look and even make the outfit look better, according to a handful of customers
Several purchasers have ranked the Reebok Sole Fury SE as one of their favorite sneakers from the brand
The sneaker has a good arch support, as per some reviews
cons: Some shoppers are disappointed that the colors shown online didn’t look the same in person (e.g., the red looked more like hot pink
One customer has voiced out that the laces were too long but were not long enough to be tied twice
When tied only once, the laces flopped around his feet

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wear 9.5 women. Purchased 8.0 men. Perfect fit. If you like a half inch room in toe box, buy a half size up. Plenty of cushion. Very comfortable. Easy to slip on and off. I run a little, bike a little and walk a lot and they have held up just fine. I can't believe they only cost me $25 bucks so I purchased a second pair in women. The men pair really aren't that much wider than the women pair. Can't say enough about how pleased I am with this purchase. They look as pictured/described.
customer_reviews.author: gvo

customer_reviews.title: light weight,snug fit,price was right.
customer_reviews.text: size 12 is one of those anomalies which makes online purchases hit and miss. this shoe is light and has a superbly snug fit. with other shoes in this category i have ran into issues with rolling and ankle or the top side was not flexible for any amount of comfort. i purchased these, more like stole, mostly due to price and brand recognition. i have found myself comparing all other shoes to these. that, my friend, is justification for the for any product to be on your feet. its not their slogan but you should "just do it". you may thank me, but all the love goes to Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: dr. long

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love them but...
customer_reviews.text: The toe box was too narrow for my feet and my feet are not wide width. I originally ordered a 10.5 & those were too large. I returned them and tried the 10 and they fit better...they were just too narrow. I really wanted to love them. They are very comfy, just didn't fit my feet correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: for the price, great buy
customer_reviews.text: these are pretty good shoes. a little tight slipping on and off, but otherwise fit fine. have been breaking them in and starting to get comfy. i find myself wearing them without noticing i still have them on. for a $20 shoe, they are clean and stylish (for this almost 40 yr old guy that doesn't care about shoe styles). i would buy these again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: A Steal!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my 4th pair of Reebok Running/training shoes I’ve purchased this year, and these are great. Very cushioned and comfortable. Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Okbassplayerguy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most perfect fitting shoes I have found in a very long time. They're lightweight and super comfy and bouncy. Definitely great designed shoes for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice design and I like the material but I couldn’t even fit my feet through coz the opening is small. I have two other regular size 13 Reebok shoes that I don’t have any issues with.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: so i got these for my husband and he is a size 10 but these fit way to snug on his feet they were so snug he only wore them once i would suggest going at least 1⁄2 a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Lesure

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: They look so cool but fit is terrible. First they are a struggle to put on. Secondly they are just to narrow in the tongue area. Maybe if they made a wide they’d be better??
customer_reviews.author: Lord James

customer_reviews.title: Fabric on the side ripped after a month
customer_reviews.text: Fabric torn... shoes are not durable at all, and Reebok has no stated warranty (as per their customer service rep). Stay away from Reebok as a company. Will be returning these through amazon
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH ANTONACCIO

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have had many pair of gym shoes, these are one of the most comfortable pair of shoes ive worn, extremely lightweight. would buy again. Ive owned these for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: leatherneck

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe company
customer_reviews.text: Reebok sole fury are my favorite sneaker. Super comfortable and stylish. I own several pairs now and it's all I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Young

customer_reviews.title: love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes. makes my legs look good in shorts as well. needed a footpad to make working on my feet all day at work better but overall great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I normally dont wear black sneeks but these are a great addition to my wardrobe. I wanted something that would compliment my moto ripped jeans. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Run small not true to fit but still great shoes
customer_reviews.text: If I had known they ran small I would have ordered a bigger size other than that I just love them
customer_reviews.author: Diane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: i wear a regular width, and these shoes seem to run about a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and they both have the same sole defects. They have great support. 1st time I use this pair But if you dont mind .$20 its a good price
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Only bad pair of reeboks I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good. Fits snug on whole foot. Might be real leather. My pair Might be old stock, as cracking at preparation holes over toe cap on right shoe. Also a low spot in left shoe foot bed making a pressure point. Creating pain so not wearable. Threw out after two days
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got a half size bigger so I don't have pressure on my big toe shoes are great
customer_reviews.author: XAVIER MATHIS

customer_reviews.title: Good looks but run small go a size up fir comfort
customer_reviews.text: Gym shoe looks good but came small for my size
customer_reviews.author: REGINALD MURRAY

customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!!!! My son wears them all the time. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sho.
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable for long day of use. I own two pairs
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: They fit to size
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE SNEAKERS I GIVE THEM A 5 STAR
customer_reviews.author: Adona

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Felt a little too big in toe box for my feet
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size larger for better fit !  Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: These run small , I ordered half a size bigger and they fit great !
customer_reviews.author: Alina Alamo

customer_reviews.title: tight and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed, I really like the style but they are not very comfortable, I don't know if it is because of the size but i don't find them very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lweonel Parquiks

customer_reviews.title: True fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them. He said they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes super light and airy I’ve bought three different pair very stylish and comfortable and they hold up for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod goen

customer_reviews.title: These are sick!
customer_reviews.text: They seem authentic and all that. I haven't put any wear into 'em yet, so we'll have to see how they hold up. They look great though! Got a good price for my color (white and neon).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was just as explained and is a very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes quickly became my everyday shoe. They're very lightweight, but sturdy, and they're so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL AND BEASTY
customer_reviews.text: SHARP MAN'S SNEEKERS. LIGHT, COMFORTABLE AND DURABLE. THEY CAN GO FORWARD OR BACKWARDS LIKE MY GIRLFRIEND. (SMILE)
customer_reviews.author: BIG JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fits like expected . Very comfortable . Snugg first but just right
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as workout shoes and I get compliments every time I wear them out. Great comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.author: David Hairston

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST SHOE IN IT PRICE RANGE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are super comfy and very light. They are great for people who walk alot. But keep in mind they are under 100 bucks so with everyday use will last 6-8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: surprised by the material seriously didn't expect it but it perfect love it
customer_reviews.author: jaouad

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit off the size chart. Need to order 1\2 size larger to have a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and breathing shoes. My feet are usually very sweaty but in these shoes they don't sweat even in the hottest weather. So good!
customer_reviews.author: Andr

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have any negative comments on these I love them they are comfortable and good for running and training in
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable light shoes, got compliments from several people on the style. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BillButner

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great, fits great and even surpasses my expectations. Very comfortable. People who see them, love them...
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: No complaints fit great awesome gym shoes comfortable to lift in good bounce and cushion for cardio
customer_reviews.author: Rob Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Feel
customer_reviews.text: The Sole Fury design by Reebok is a winner! The shoes are extremely comfortable on and cushion your feet really well when walking or in a short sprint. I don't run distance, so I cannot comment on their performance for running. The design and look of the white, black and "teal" (dark green) is great on and they are one of my favorite pair of active wear shoes!
customer_reviews.author: LE

product_meta.title: Reebok Sole Fury Se, Men’s Sole Fury Se
product_meta.description: Reebok Men's Sole Fury SE, white/black/skull grey/primal red 12 M US
feature_bullets: Designed for: Running; Performance shoes with street-ready style, the Sole Fury utilizes a split midsole/outsole design to deliver ultra-lightweight and flexible cushioning.
Asymmetrical lacing system for a locked-down fit
Removable EVA foam sockliner accommodates orthotics
